add_an_extra_layer_of_security_to_your_a: जोड़ें an extra layer of security to your account
install_google_authenticator_authy_or_mi: Install Google Authenticator, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator on your phone
scan_the_qr_code_with_your_authenticator: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
enter_the_6_digit_code_from_your_app_to_: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify

these_codes_can_be_used_to_access_your_a: These codes can be used to access your account if you lose your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
